name: 洪媽益
objective:
此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的：
"　　提昇高階字彙數量
"　　加強英文閱讀能力
"　　習得重要字源解析
"　　避上下文中的用字錯誤
"　　提高英語表達能力
"　　加強英文寫作能力
"　　精進英語文溝通技巧
This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:
"　　Develop a powerful vocabulary
"　　Improve reading skills
"　　Learn important word roots
"　　Avoid word usage error in context
"　　Become a better speaker
"　　Strengthen his/her writing ability
"　　Improve communication skills
schedule:
W1 September 9/13, Orientation and pre-test at 9am on September 9
W2 September 16/20, Vocab 1 and word roots sub-/super-
W3 September 23/27, Vocab 2 and word roots pre-/post-
W4 September 30/October 4, Vocab 3 and word roots bene-/mal-
W5 October 7, Vocab 4 (no classes on October 11)
W6 October 14, Vocab 5 (no classes on October 18, make-up on September 9)
W7 October 21/25, Vocab 6 and word roots ante-/anti-/pro-
W8 October 28/November 1, Vocab 7 and word roots bi-/mono-
W9 November 4/8, Vocab 8 and word roots bio-/gen-
W10 November 11/15, Vocab 9 and word roots anthrop-/morph-
W11 November 18/22, Vocab 10 and word roots graph-/gram-/scrib-
W12 November 25/29, Vocab 11 and word roots cred-/ver-/fid-
W13 December 2/6, Vocab 12 and word roots cogn-/gnos-/-logy
W14 December 9/13, Vocab 13 and word roots circum-/vert-
W15 December 16/20, Vocab 14 and word roots log-/dict-
W16 December 23/27, Vocab 15 and word roots syn-/sym-/syl-/tort-
W17 December 30/January 3, Vocab 16 and word root phob-
W18 January 6/10, FINAL EXAM/Post-test
END
scorePolicy:
Dialogue Role-play: 20%
Assignments/presentations: 30%
Quizzes/Seatwork: 30%
Final Exams: 20%
END
